Githzerai culture venerates the mastery of the self, inner balance, and mental fortitude. In their fortresses within Limbo, the githzerai hone their minds to a razor's edge.

Mental Discipline. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.races.uIPfSjhElWKeOWHD]{Mental Discipline} You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, frightened, or stunned.

Githzerai Psionics. @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.races.emWaTsH6gzwzk8Wy]{Githzerai Psionics} If you are a gith, your innate psionics are strengthened with practice.

When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.z1mx84ONwkXKUZd7]{Shield} spell once with this trait, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.ppWAAEul0QHtm4er]{Detect Thoughts} spell once with this trait, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest.

Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for these spells. When you cast them with this trait, they don't require components.

Languages. You can speak, read, and write Common and Gith.

Foundry Note

You can drag your choices from the above onto your character sheet and it will automatically update.
